label: Taxi Services
description: Transportation services for individuals and groups via taxi cabs, minicabs, and private hire vehicles.
intents: Book a taxi for immediate or future transportation
Find a taxi service in a specific location
Compare prices and services of different taxi companies
Book a private hire vehicle for a group
Buy or sell a taxi cab

subcategories.label: Local Taxi Services
subcategories.description: Taxi services that operate within a specific local area.

subcategories.label: Airport Transfers
subcategories.description: Taxi services that provide transportation to and from airports.

subcategories.label: Private Hire Vehicles
subcategories.description: Taxi services that provide private hire vehicles for groups.

subcategories.label: Taxi Cab Sales
subcategories.description: Buying and selling of taxi cabs.
